1374: Hilduardis was born in Cromme straet in 1374.
1378: Lost mother at the age of 4.
Lost father at the age of 4.
Left Cromme straet.C.2 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 5.
1388: Got married to Harlo at age 15 in 1388.
Was taken out of orphanage at age 15.
Left orphanage at the age of 15.
Hilduardis moved to Die Coninc straet.B.8 after marriage.
Moved in with husband Harlo after marriage.
1389: Lost son Thomas when Thomas was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Thomas in 1389 at age 15.
Lost sibling Helyana in 1389 when Helyana was 19.
1391: Gave birth to Liedelde in 1391 at age 17.
Lost sibling Haghen in 1391 when Haghen was 16.
1392: Gave birth to Helpriko in 1392 at age 18.
1395: Gave birth to Goneir in 1395 at age 21.
1396: Lost daughter Liedelde when Liedelde was 6 years old.
1399: Died while giving birth to Laurens in 1399 at age 25.
